title: skyverse
author: skyverse
content: Hello, I would like to present the Skyverse, the extraordinary Metaverse experience🚀🤩💥⚡💸💰💹WELCOME TO SKYVERSE💹💰💸⚡💥🤩🚀  🧛‍♀️SKYVERSE offers you to create your METAVERSE AVTAR by uploading your photo  🎮SKYVERSE offers you infinite possibilities to explore PLAY and EARN  💻SKYVERSE offers a wide range of JOB OPPORTUNITIES related to METAVERSE  🏢SKYVERSE is a DIGITAL REAL ESTATE and it is going to be worth a lot more than a REAL ESTATE  🏬SKYVERSE SHOPPING MALL, offers BUSINESSES with one of the largest profit-making opportunities, in the form of VIRTUAL REALITY MARKET and INDUSTRY  🎭SKYVERSE NFTs, allow the users to have absolute control over their DIGITAL ASSETS within the Metaverse. This immovable affirmation of OWNERSHIP is often, enabled by BLOCKCHAIN TECHNOLOGY  🏪SKYVERSE DE-FI BANKING is much more than just a bank  🌆SKYVERSE ART GALLERY will change the way WE ENJOY ART  🏙Create your Metaverse ECOSYSTEM on SKYVERSE    🔥SKYVERSE IS MUCH LARGER THAN THE PHYSICAL WORLD🔥 🔺🔺🔺🔺🔺🔺🔺🔺🔺🔺🔺🔺🔺🔺🔺🔺🔺🔺🔺🔺🔺🔺🔺🔺🔺 🔻🔻🔻🔻🔻🔻🔻🔻🔻🔻🔻🔻🔻🔻🔻🔻🔻🔻🔻🔻🔻🔻🔻🔻🔻         🌐 FOR MORE DETAILS VISIT OUR OFFICIAL WEBSITE🌐                                   📝Whitepaper🔗:- https://skyverse.gitbook.io/skyverse-overview/   🚸Roadmap🔗:-https://skyverse.gitbook.io/skyverse-overview/roadmap    💸Tokenomics🔗:-https://skyverse.gitbook.io/skyverse-overview/tokenomics   🌐Website🔗:- http://Skyverse.estate   🧚‍♀️Twitter🔗:- https://twitter.com/skyverse101.   🔹Facebook🔗:- https://www.facebook.com/SKY-VERSE-106454582015654  💰💹💴💵💶💷💸💴💵💶💷💸💴💵💶💷💸💴💵💹💰

comments.author: holydarkness
comments.body: Quote from: skyverse on May 27, 2022, 08:17:48 AM[...] 🧛‍♀️SKYVERSE offers you to create your METAVERSE AVTAR by uploading your photo  [...]How safe will this photo uploading be? Basically, you're giving a different name to KYC and data collection. And what about the security risk of leak or breach into your database? Maybe I am not too familiar with the whole metaverse system, but wasn't the main idea of VR metaverse is an option to people to create any image they want? Wouldn't using their own image kinda defeat the purpose? and how can you be sure that the image they use for their avatar is rightfully theirs and not someone else's workout consent?

comments.author: holydarkness
comments.body: Quote from: skyverse on June 04, 2022, 06:16:47 AMwe are on it.......And, my questions are still left unattended
